title: EVALUATE
description: Returns the value of a formula stored in a custom field, evaluated at runtime. Optionally retrieves fields from related records.

parameters.name: retrieve_source_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of source fields whose values are used as inputs when evaluating the formula.

parameters.name: relationship_name_optional
parameters.description: The Object name used to retrieve fields from a related record.

examples.code:
-- PricingRule__c is a custom field on OpportunityLineItem
